text: Robert Joel Kulick (January 16, 1950 â€“ May 28, 2020) was an American rock/pop/jazz guitarist and record producer. He was born in New York City. He was best known for his studio work with Kiss and for his works with W.A.S.P. Kulick died on May 28, 2020 in Las Vegas at the age of 70. ==References== ==Other websites== *"Bob Kulick Official MySpace Site" Category:1950 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American pop musicians Category:American rock guitarists Category:American jazz musicians Category:American record producers Category:Musicians from New York City Category:Businesspeople from New York City
